choices.answer: Words on Wheels
Wash Our Wheels
World of Wonders

questions.question: What story does Mrs. Nguyen refer to when she says she wouldn't mind having the golden touch?

choices.answer: A legend about the sun
A myth about King Midas
A history of the California Gold Rush

questions.question: What is the theme of the play?

choices.answer: Everyone should be on televison
Family can help you achieve your goals
People can work together to help the community
No one is coming to the library
Mrs. Nguyen is taking a new job
The library is out of money

questions.question: How does Mr. Diaz help the children?

choices.answer: He takes them to the library
He prints flyers for their fundraiser.
He agrees to let them use his parking lot.

questions.question: How does Jake help the children?

choices.answer: He helps them develop a plan.
He introduces them to a new reporter.
He helps them have bake sale

questions.question: Which event makes the children's work successful?

choices.answer: A camera operator gives a lot of money to the children
The children wash the bookmobile
Maria Kopanas interviews the children

questions.question: Where would you look to find out how many actors are needed for the play?

choices.answer: The dialogue in Act II
The Cast of Characters
the stage directions in Act I

questions.question: Where are the settings of the play described?

choices.answer: in the stage directions
in the dialogue
The beginning of each scene

questions.question: Why does the author include stage directions in parentheses ( )?

choices.answer: To tell who is speaking and why
to describe the setting and the plot
to describe actions and characters' emotions
